item.description:
Starting off at the base of South Uncanoonuc Mtn. near Uncanoonuc Lake we will hike to the top of South Uncanoonuc using the Summit Trail. Then we will also use part of the Incline Trail and the Walker Trail to do a loop around the top of the summit. Coming down part of the Summit Trail we will then use the Link Trail to cross Mountain Road, then hike the Class 6 Road, and the Blue Trail to hike to the top of North Uncanoonuc Mtn. Returning back down the Class 6 Road we will cross Mountain Road again and then use some unnamed trails as well as the Bickford Trail to return to the starting point.

Looking at a trail map the elevation gain on this hike is approximately 1,324 feet as far as I can tell. South Uncanoonuc is 1321' and North Uncanoonuc is 1,324' in elevation. There are some view points on both Mtns. The total hike length is somewhere between approximately 4.5 to 5 miles or so.

A link to a trail map: http://goffstowntrails.com/pdf/Uncanoonuc-Hikes-Color.pdf

Car Pool Locations:

Bedford, NH: 209 NH 101, Harvest, Market @ 9:30 AM

Per club policy, no guests. Please have your adult guests join the club. A minor would need a waiver signed by a parent or guardian.

As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com; the leader(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you release, hold harmless, and indemnify the leader(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons.
item.how_to_find_us: Once you are on Mountain Base Road continue past 163 Mountain Base Road to the end at the town beach parking lot just past Bressard Avenue.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: South and North Uncanoonuc Mountains - 2 Peaks
